# Introduction

The `tidychem` package ...

# Walkthrough

Let's load the package:

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library("tidychem")
library("magrittr")
library("readr")
```

```{r,eval=FALSE}
mols <- "smi-multiple.smi" %>% tidychem_example %>% read_smiles

# ECFP4
mols %>% fp_morgan

# similarity
# mols %>% fp_morgan %>% sim_tanimoto

# matrix
mols %>% fp_morgan(explicit = TRUE)
```

```{r,eval=FALSE}
df <- "logd74.tsv" %>% tidychem_example %>% read_tsv
y <- df$logD7.4
mols <- df$SMILES %>% parse_smiles
mols

# matrix of 2D/3D descriptors
x <- mols %>% desc_2d
x
x[which(is.na(x))] <- 0
```

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library("glmnet")

cvfit = cv.glmnet(x, y)
plot(cvfit)

fit <- glmnet(x, y)
plot(fit)
head(coef(fit, s = cvfit$lambda.min, exact = TRUE), n = 30)
```
